resources.string: The application is a recommendation. The amount of water is calculated based on the average data. For more accurate information contact the doctor.
During the work of the application, there may be periods of increased battery consumption. However, there is no cause for concern, such periods are rare and usually short

App personalize your advertising experience using AdMob.

 AdMob and its partners may collect and process personal data such as device identifiers, location data, demographic and interest data to provide other advertising experience tailored to you.

 By agreeing, you confirm that you are over the age of 16 and would like a personalized ad experience.
Congratulations!\nYou reached a daily water goal!
